input.sentences: a mexican-theme party was thrown at an office .
folding tables were set up on which the food was placed .
the food consisted of tacos | beans and chips .
a pinata hung from the ceiling .
a blind-folded man was able to hit and break the pinata .
output.sentences: Hank decided that he wanted the theme for his family reunion party to be a Mexican fiesta.
He got the right clothes for the mood and found some great recipes and catering company and tables for the affair.
The taco plates, in particular, were really tasty looking.
He also got some candy-filled pinatas for the party and some sticks.
His sister posed beside a pinata, wearing a big smile, right before she smashed it to smithereens.
